title: Doubt
content: I'm pretty sure that my isa 1 score will be disastrous so if I work hard and score well in isa2 and Esa is there any chance for me to score above 8.5 sgpa atleast..if so how much do I need to score in them?ðŸ˜­

comments.body: Theres is  a chance if u do well in isa2 , projects and ESA well
How much do I need to score approx in these?
Check the GPA related post in the FAQs for a breakdown.
There's nothing much useful in it tbhðŸ«¥

don't worry about something that hasn't arrived yet. Just try your best for isa 1 and tackle one thing at a time. If lack of preparation was the cause then you already know what you should do to make up for it next time :)

all the best!!!

Your final grade is a combination of ISA1 + ISA2 + ESA + assingment/project. If you want an A grade, you can scale each component and see how much you need in the respective components. There is no "how much" because it depends on how you score in each component.
Hi rowlett Im aiml 3rd sem and I need to buy a new laptop.Should I go for a mac or a gaming laptop?Im looking at lenovo legion which has a 4070
